have no upper age limit for contestants. Also in a departure from Idol, the first time a contestant auditions, it is in front of an audience of thousands, not just for the judges. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, said Simon Cowell in a statement. Fiat chief backing away from his previous remarks in a telephone conversation with labour minister Maurizio Sacconi . According to the ministry, Sergio Marchionne explained that he spoke in "hypothetical" terms and that nothing was decided, with no reference about a new location for the company's leadership for today or tomorrow.
